testcase.name: Adding items to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is in the Home Page..............................................passed When User searched for Oppo mobile and printed its name on the UI...........passed And Check the size and color of mobile and print the same on UI............passed And Go to customer question & answer section and print top three question and answers.passed And Add item to cart and also verify it in the cart.........................passed And Go to shopping cart and increase the quantity...........................passed Then Verify the item in the cart and console the total amount of product....passed
